Throughout the year, observe children &: Tjheja abentwana bese ufaka okutjhejileko, umnyaka woke.
Let's pretend you're tracking progress f: Asenze kwangathi silandelela ituthuko yomntwana onguThemba. Thepha lapha ukuthoma!
You will be shown the right assessment f: Uzakukhonjiswa ukuhlola okulungele iminyaka yomtwana loyo.
Pretend that, while observing Temba, you: Yenza kwangathi ngesikhathi utjheja uThemba, uyambona bonyana uyamomotheka. Thepha “Iye” ukuphendula!
Great!\n\n If you are not sure if Temba: Usebenzile! Nangabe awunasiqiniseko sokobana uThemba uyakwazi ukwenza okuthile, ungakhetha “Angazi”
Some questions have pictures attached.\n: Eminye imibuzo ineenthombe ezinanyathiselweko. Thepha lapha ukubona isithombe.
Tap close to hide the picture and go bac: Thepha ku-vala ukufihla isithombe bese ubuyela kulandelelo letuthuko.
You can always leave the progress tracke: Ungakghona ukutjhiya ilandelelo letutukho bese uyabuya ngemva kwesikhathi uzokuqedelela. Zoke iimpendulo zakho zizakubulungeka. Thepha lapha.
When you have answered all the questions: Nasele uphendule yoke imibuzo, ungenza umbiko womtlhogomeli nofana uqale iimpendulo zakho godu.
You can see all of your completed report: Ungayibona yoke imibiko yakho ephelileko emuva ekhasini lemibiko lokuthoma.
